about_the_game:
Welcome to the Red Planet! Mars Colonization Survival Simulator immerses you in the exhilarating role of a pioneering astronaut, venturing to the uncharted frontiers of Mars. In this cutting-edge simulation game, you'll confront extreme conditions, finite resources, and thrilling adventures. Your mission is clear: establish, expand, endure, and unravel the mysteries of the Martian landscape. The future of human colonization on Mars rests in your capable hands.
Mars Colonization Survival Simulator is a gripping blend of strategy, resource management, and exploration. You will begin your journey on the unforgiving Martian surface with a modest habitat and a limited cache of supplies. From there, it's up to you to build a thriving, self-sustaining colony.
Game offers an immersive, thrilling experience where you'll confront the same challenges that real-life Mars colonists might face. The survival of your colony is in your hands, and the future of human exploration beyond Earth awaits. Are you ready to make history on the Red Planet? Prepare for launch and embark on this epic journey to Mars!


Realism: Experience the unparalleled atmosphere and landscapes of Mars, recreated with astonishing precision based on data from real missions. This virtual experience will bring you closer to the real planet like no other adventure.


Construction and Management: Develop and expand your base, construct residential quarters, farms, and research laboratories. Plan resource distribution, optimize structures, and manage the efficiency of every aspect of your colony. Your expertise in construction and management will be a key factor in ensuring the viability and success of your Martian base.


Survival: Battle the extreme conditions of Mars, manage resources, and devise a survival
strategy to sustain you and your colony in unpredictable circumstances. Constant threats such as radiation, natural disasters, and limited supplies will stimulate your inventiveness and adaptability, requiring quick and thoughtful decisions to maintain the livelihood of your Martian colony.


Exploration: Embark on expeditions to study the Martian surface and uncover the secrets of this planet. Solve geological mysteries, explore Martian craters and mountain ranges, search for traces of water, and remnants of past climatic changes. Your mission is to decode Mars' history and determine whether life on this planet was ever possible.
Challenge and Adaptation: Navigate through various scenarios while adapting to unforeseen events. In this challenging battle for survival on Mars, you will face extreme conditions that demand constant adaptation. Mistakes could be costly, but your ability to react swiftly and make difficult decisions may mitigate the failures of your mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the Red Planet! Mars Colonization Survival Simulator offers you the opportunity to take on the role of the first pioneers of Mars. You will find yourself in extreme conditions with limited resources and your mission is to build, develop, sustain and explore the mysterious Martian terrain.
